name: 51zero
tagline: World Class experts in Big Data Technology
description:
Established in 2009, building on our founder's years of experience of successful delivery for Tier 1 investment banks, we've delivered many innovative solutions for our clients. We focus on Agile and Lean software practices, best of breed technology and reliable, repeatable delivery mechanism.
Our consultants are some of the few people in the world that have proven experience in consistently delivering the 'truly' complex problems, whether that is sub millisecond latency, extremely high throughput, graph analytics on Big Data scale or 'really' Big Data problems.  Our team includes Apache Spark contributors, creators of open source projects with over 1000 stars on github, published authors, speakers at technology conferences and highly reputed financial service software delivery experts.
READ MORE...
